se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor

Class TextFileBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.natusoft.tools.fileeditor.TextFileBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TextBuffer

    public class TextFileBuffer
extends Object
implements TextBuffer
    This is an implementation of the TextBuffer interface.

    Files can be loaded into the buffer and the buffer saved to file again. Individual lines in the buffer can be fetched, replaced, removed, and inserted.

    Attatch a TextBuffer to a TextFileEditor to do more advanced editing on it. Each TextFileEditor also has a default TextFileBuffer that is used if no other is provided.

    See Also:
    TextFileEditor
